task.title: Common cmd warehouse topic
task.shortdesc: This is the common cmd warehouse topic. This topic should never be included in a DITAMap, it is used ONLY for conrefs.

step.cmd: Select Add.
Select Close.
Select Edit.
Select Finish.
Select Go.
Select Next.
Select OK.
Select Print.
Select Run.
Select Save.
Select Search.
Select Submit.
Close Cognos Viewer.
Select the Globe icon to enter descriptions in additional languages.

info.draft-comment: To be removed as a common cmd.

step.cmd: Select X to close the employee record.
Enter a stub description to appear on the employee pay statement.
From the Report Category drop-down list, select the applicable report category.

info.draft-comment: Talk to author - can we change this to "Select a report category."

step.cmd: Select the employee name.
Enter a description.
Run the report.
From the Review Summary page, complete one of the following:

info.draft-comment: See if we can find out how this is handled elsewhere?

step.cmd: Log off Business Intelligence and UltiPro.
Select Save to continue entering review information.

info.draft-comment: Perhaps we need an "Getting Started w/ UltiPro functionality job aid that would include Save and Save and Close"

step.cmd: Save the report.
Select the Schedule icon to view or modify the payroll processing schedule.

info.draft-comment: Need to research this - where used.

step.cmd: Enter a code.

info.draft-comment: Should we combine code and description?

step.cmd: In the Block Taxes section, check the tax boxes to be blocked.
In the Pay Statement Options section, check the Calculate Pay Rate If Hours Exist box, if applicable.
In the Rules section, select the applicable calculation rule from the Calculation drop-down list.
Modify the time clock code if you require a different code from the earnings Code field default.

info.draft-comment: What is the field name? Code? or Earnings Code? Look at context.

step.cmd: Review the Summary page.
Select the appropriate tab.

info.draft-comment: Is this really necessary as a step? How do I know what the appropriate tab is?

step.cmd: If earnings are not active, uncheck the Active box; otherwise, the Active box is checked by default.
From the Standard toolbar, select the Save icon.
In the Include Earnings In section, select all applicable fields for the earnings.
Add data items to the work area.
Check the Append Salary or Hourly to Stub Description box. The Append Salary or Hourly to Stub Description appears on the employee's pay statement.
Enter the values for each field:

info.draft-comment: need to look at the context.

step.cmd: In the Pay Entry Options section, select the Display in Pay Data Entry for earnings that commonly occur in every pay period.

info.draft-comment: Is this a checkbox? Commonly occur in every? Can something occur sometimes every time?

step.cmd: Save the report to My Folders.
Select a goal plan. Goals assigned to the goal plan appear on the Goal Planning Details page.

info.draft-comment: Remove as reusable step because of stepresult embedded in cmd.

step.cmd: Select the Data Items tab.

info.draft-comment: Analyze usage - do we need to select the tab?

step.cmd: Validate the expression.
Validate the expression and then select OK.

info.draft-comment: Each action should be a step, and we have Select OK and Validate the Expression as common cmds already.

step.cmd: Run the report in HTML format, review the report output, and then close the report viewer.

info.draft-comment: Should this be 3 steps? Do we need "review the report output?" what is the context?
